title: In Conversation: Does blood hold the key to the fountain of youth?
itunes:title: In Conversation: Does blood hold the key to the fountain of youth?
description: People have been searching for a way to delay or even reverse the effects of old age for centuries — and new research shows that our own blood may be the key. Journalist Kat McGowan wrote for Popular Science about recent studies that suggest something in blood could undo the effects of aging. McGowan spoke with Apple News Today host Duarte Geraldino about these promising findings.
